articles.description: Arsenal enjoyed a successful decade during the 1990s winning two league titles but the question has been asked as to how many current Gunners would feature in those victorious teams
articles.content:
Nigel Winterburn played in several winning Arsenal teams and has only named Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang and Bukayo Saka as potential squad members.
The former left-back won top flight titles under Geo… [+1744 chars]

articles.title: Real Madrid 'fear £650,000-a-week Gareth Bale will have to return after Tottenham loan struggles' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Bale returned to Tottenham after falling out of favour at Real. However, his form at Spurs has been a concern and question marks have been raised about whether Jose Mourinho will sign him.
articles.content:
Real Madrid hold real fears that Gareth Bale's stop-start loan spell at Tottenham could scupper their plans to make sensational swoops for Kylian Mbappe and Erling Haaland.
